sqlGroup.name: fixRecord
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT mfr.id, mfr.car_id, mfr.breakdown_info, date_format(mfr.breakdown_time, '%Y-%m-%d') breakdown_time, date_format(mfr.fix_time, '%Y-%m-%d') fix_time, mfr.fix_location, mfr.fixer, mfr.breakdown_reson, mfr.solution, mfr.ok_flag, mfr.remark, mfr.create_time, mci.car_no, mci.car_no_color, mci.car_flag, mci.engine_gass_type -- @where FROM mo_fix_record mfr LEFT JOIN mo_car_info mci ON mci.id = mfr.car_id LEFT JOIN mo_driver md ON md.id = mci.driver_id -- @condition WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT mfr.id, mfr.car_id, mfr.breakdown_info, date_format(mfr.breakdown_time, '%Y-%m-%d') breakdown_time, date_format(mfr.fix_time, '%Y-%m-%d') fix_time, mfr.fix_location, mfr.fixer, mfr.breakdown_reson, mfr.solution, mfr.ok_flag, mfr.remark, mfr.create_time, mci.car_no, mci.car_no_color, mci.car_flag, mci.engine_gass_type -- @where FROM mo_fix_record mfr LEFT JOIN mo_car_info mci ON mci.id = mfr.car_id LEFT JOIN mo_driver md ON md.id = mci.driver_id -- @condition WHERE exists(select 1 from mo_car_permission mcp WHERE mcp.car_id = mfr.car_id and mcp.user_id = ?) ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT mfr.id, mfr.car_id, mfr.breakdown_info, date_format(mfr.breakdown_time, '%Y-%m-%d') breakdown_time, date_format(mfr.fix_time, '%Y-%m-%d') fix_time, mfr.fix_location, mfr.fixer, mfr.breakdown_reson, mfr.solution, mfr.ok_flag, mfr.remark, mfr.create_time, mci.car_no, mci.car_no_color, mci.car_flag, mci.engine_gass_type -- @where FROM mo_fix_record mfr LEFT JOIN mo_car_info mci ON mci.id = mfr.car_id LEFT JOIN mo_driver md ON md.id = mci.driver_id -- @condition WHERE mci.operator = ? ORDER BY create_time DESC
